words.defineEn: a political system in which a mob is the source of control; government by the masses
words.defineVi: một hệ thống chính trị trong đó một đám đông là nguồn kiểm soát; chính quyền của quần chúng

examples: She is currently taking a break to recharge her batteries.
I often go for a walk to recharge my batteries.
Next month, I will go on a yoga retreat to recharge my batteries.
We have been resting all weekend to recharge our batteries for the upcoming week.
If I feel burned out, I will take a day off to recharge my batteries.
words.defineEn: an assault in which the assailant makes physical contact
words.defineVi: một cuộc tấn công trong đó kẻ tấn công tiếp xúc vật lý

examples: Or were they actually going to have the temerity to try to put their thumb on the scale of a U.S. election?
That was the one that stuck with me 'cause I was so shocked, that someone that young just had the guts and temerity and vision, and then saw it all the way through.
words.defineEn: fearless daring
words.defineVi: táo bạo không sợ hãi

examples: It’s about decency.
People are hungering for trustworthiness and decency.
People are hungering for trustworthiness and decency.
He is running a campaign essentially of character and decency.
He had been the model of decorum and decency during his entire time.
words.defineEn: the quality of being polite and respectable
words.defineVi: phẩm chất lịch sự và đáng kính

examples: The ultra contaminated tannery site in downtown Rockford.
About 15 minutes from Sandy's house is the site of the old Wolverine tannery in downtown Rockford.
We went high up into the old town by the tannery to find a quiet place to talk.
In 2005, sales topped $1 billion for the first time, and in 2009, the old tannery in Rockford was scheduled for demolition.
When Lynn heard about the tannery demolition back in 2009, she got worried about the potential contamination just a couple blocks from her house.
words.defineEn: workplace where skins and hides are tanned
words.defineVi: nơi làm việc nơi da và da bị rám nắng

words.defineEn: the state of being a married couple voluntarily joined for life (or until divorce)
words.defineVi: tình trạng vợ chồng tự nguyện gắn bó trọn đời (hoặc cho đến khi ly hôn)

words.defineEn: income from capital investment paid in a series of regular payments
words.defineVi: thu nhập từ đầu tư vốn được trả trong một loạt các khoản thanh toán định kỳ

words.defineEn: a political system governed by the wealthy people
words.defineVi: một hệ thống chính trị được cai trị bởi những người giàu có

words.defineEn: feeling jolly and jovial and full of good humor
words.defineVi: cảm thấy vui vẻ và vui vẻ và đầy hài hước

words.defineEn: unrighteousness by virtue of lacking respect for a god
words.defineVi: bất chính bởi đức tính thiếu tôn trọng đối với một vị thần

examples: This author's editor asked her a simple question that opened the floodgates of creativity and changed the trajectory of her career.
The trajectory is down.
- How's that trajectory.
Mo's stores have had a similar trajectory.
Our trajectory is going in the right direction.
words.defineEn: the path followed by an object moving through space
words.defineVi: con đường theo sau bởi một đối tượng di chuyển trong không gian

examples: Your opponents are masters of strategy, as well as sorcery, and you know they’ll make the choices that maximize their own chances of success.
The goddess of love and sorcery, Freya, traveled across the sky in a wagon pulled by two giant, flying cats.
I don't think I've ever understood the sorcery.
[rotor noise] (Destin) What kind of sorcery is this?
But many featured mythic heroes fighting long odds with the help of magical swords and sorcery.
words.defineEn: the belief in magical spells that harness occult forces or evil spirits to produce unnatural effects in the world
words.defineVi: niềm tin vào các phép thuật khai thác các thế lực huyền bí hoặc linh hồn ma quỷ để tạo ra các hiệu ứng phi tự nhiên trên thế giới

words.defineEn: a rite or body of rites prescribed for public worship
words.defineVi: một nghi thức hoặc một phần các nghi thức được quy định cho sự thờ phượng công cộng

examples: The army was above the law and enjoyed complete impunity.
Where impunity is the law.
The police have cracked down with impunity.
It will not happen again with impunity.
And they do it with a certain level of impunity, at least.
words.defineEn: exemption from punishment or loss
words.defineVi: miễn hình phạt hoặc mất mát

examples: I miss the time that your word was your bond, now it seams like you have forgotten your fealty.
words.defineEn: the loyalty that citizens owe to their country (or subjects to their sovereign)
words.defineVi: lòng trung thành mà công dân nợ đất nước của họ (hoặc chủ thể đối với chủ quyền của họ)

examples: She has a larger outdoor aviary space when the weather is warm enough.
My first encounter with getting close to pigeons was cleaning a large aviary full of them.
Macaws really need a large aviary, a room, or several rooms to be active in during the day.
These behaviors were established in her outdoor aviary so I was fully in her enclosure with her, which made things much easier because I never felt the need to be cautious of her flying away from me.
words.defineEn: a large cage or building where birds are kept
words.defineVi: một cái lồng lớn hoặc tòa nhà nơi giữ chim

examples: As a project manager, I prioritize tasks based on their urgency and importance.
There's no urgency, so please don't make the journey other than at your convenience.
After attending the conference, I saw the topic of climate change in a new light, realizing the urgency and importance of taking action.
I can smell your urgency.
I brought the medicine for your urgency.
words.defineEn: an urgent situation calling for prompt action
words.defineVi: một tình huống khẩn cấp kêu gọi hành động nhanh chóng

examples: Some law enforcement agencies and dignitaries like Attorney General William Barr would argue that the protection provided by encryption also protects criminals and terrorists.

U.S. Attorney General William Barr, along with dignitaries from the UK and Australia, warned that, quote, "Security enhancements to the virtual world should not make us more vulnerable in the physical world."
He traveled, despite the pandemic, under tight security for meetings with dignitaries and members of the country's Christian minority.
Here she will lie in state over the next four days and after which King Charles, family, and dignitaries will pay their respects.
All of a sudden, millions of people around the world, including some powerful dignitaries, are broadcasting themselves online.
words.defineEn: an important or influential (and often overbearing) person
words.defineVi: một người quan trọng hoặc có ảnh hưởng (và thường hống hách)

examples: The balls switched velocities.
So velocity is your displacement over time.
So velocity is distance over time.
In this study, the team of astronomers used velocities of 86 speedy planetary nebulas, or the remnants of certain stars, in the Andromeda Galaxy.
So as the quantity of motion, momentum equals mass times velocity.
words.defineEn: the speed at which something moves in a specific direction
words.defineVi: tốc độ mà một cái gì đó di chuyển theo một hướng cụ thể

examples: And if you’ve watched an episode of this show before, you’ll know by now, marginality often equals monstrosity.
And unchecked reason, like that of Dr. Frankenstein, created monstrosities.
They're these giant black monstrosities that kind of remind us of our old desktops.
This is what I would expect, but then what is this monstrosity?
Let’s just talk about the monstrosity that is season 6.
words.defineEn: something hideous or frightful
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó gớm ghiếc hoặc đáng sợ
